source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_00<tab>With Cid's modifications now installed, the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> is finally ready to make the journey to the Howling Eye.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_00<tab>シドは冒険者と共にガルーダ討伐に向かいたいようだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_01<tab>Stirred by the familiar roar of the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>'s engines, Cid endeavors to recall his past; try though he might, he is unable to navigate the dark corridors of his mind alone. But what if he had company? Wielding the power of the Echo, you guide him through a series of forgotten memories, detailing the path that led the once-loyal engineer to turn his back on Garlemald and flee to Eorzea. When you finally awake from the visions, Cid triumphantly declares that he remembers everything─his name, his people, and his purpose. Shortly thereafter, he guides the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> through Garuda's wall of wind without incident, delivering you to the Howling Eye at long last. Speak with Alphinaud before proceeding into the primal's sanctuary.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_01<tab>ついにガルーダ討伐作戦が開始された。飛空艇「エンタープライズ」で嵐を越え、蛮神「ガルーダ」の祭壇「ハウリングアイ石塔群」に到着した。祭壇前にいる「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_02<tab>Alphinaud declares that the end is at hand─be it Garuda's or your own. Strike fear into the hearts of beastmen across Eorzea by defeating the Lady of the Vortex.

※Challenge the Howling Eye with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the trial's entrance point.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_02<tab>アルフィノと話した。準備を整え、蛮神「ガルーダ」との決戦に挑もう！

※進入地点を調べて「サポートNPCと突入」するか、メインコマンドの「コンテンツサポーター」を選ぶことで、サポートNPCと一緒に攻略できます。
※プレイヤー同士のパーティで攻略する場合は、コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加してください。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_03<tab>Amidst the whirling winds, you succeed in striking down the Lady of the Vortex, only to see her rise once more, reinvigorated by the belief of her Ixali disciples. Yet the beastmen's prayers come to naught when Garuda's attempt to temper you fails, prompting a mysterious force to tear a Crystal of Light from her breast. It is at this moment that Gaius van Baelsar enters the fray, seemingly bent on goading the defeated primal into one final act of defiance. Garuda duly obliges, slaughtering her captive kobolds and Amalj'aa, whose cries of agony serve to summon their own patron deities. As Garuda prepares to consume the aether of her lesser brethren, the Black Wolf calls forth an unknown imperial weapon which summarily dispatches and seemingly <var 1A 02 /var>absorbs<var 1A 01 /var> all three primals. Wholly unprepared to face this awe-inspiring new foe, you have no choice but to flee for your life.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_03<tab>見事、ガルーダを倒すことができた。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_04<tab>Safely back aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>, with the imperial forces now fast-diminishing specks upon the horizon, Cid and Alphinaud begin to discuss how to address this grave new threat. Believing the best course of action is to reform the Scions of the Seventh Dawn, they decide to return to the Waking Sands. Having safely arrived in Ul'dah, speak with Alphinaud prior to continuing on to Vesper Bay.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_04<tab>ウルダハ・ランディングの「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_05<tab>Alphinaud reiterates that the beast tribes and their primals are no longer a threat, and that all efforts must now be focused upon destroying the Empire's ultimate weapon. But having seen what you have seen, it is plain that this task will ask far more of you than any you have undertaken thus far. For Eorzea's sake, you must hope that you are up to the challenge.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_SEQ_05<tab>蛮神「ガルーダ」は斃れ、当面の脅威は去った。ガレマール帝国軍の軍団長「ガイウス」と彼の操る「アルテマウェポン」のことは気になるが、今はこの勝利を喜ぼう。

target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_00<tab>アルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_01<tab>Confront Garuda in the Howling Eye.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_01<tab>蛮神「ガルーダ」を討伐

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_02<tab>ウルダハ・ランディングのアルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alphinaud.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_TODO_03<tab>ウルダハ・ランディングのアルフィノと話す

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_000<tab>According to my tests, the device is now functioning in perfect harmony with the crystal─meaning we can leave whenever you're ready.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_000<tab>これで……いいはずだ。
お前が集めてくれた偏属性クリスタルを組み合わせ、
属性変換機構を作った。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_001<tab>But you must understand: tests can only tell one so much.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_001<tab>まず、蛮神「ガルーダ」の風壁を、
ラノシアのクリスタルで、風から水属性に変換する。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_002<tab>Until we approach the Howling Eye─until we attempt to breach the barrier itself...I cannot be sure that this will work.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_002<tab>それを、黒衣森のクリスタルで水属性から土属性に変換。
最後にザナラーンのクリスタルで、
土属性から火属性に変換……している。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_003<tab>I think it only fair to tell you that there is a small but statistically significant chance that the crystal could trigger a massive...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_003<tab>……つまり、3つの「偏属性クリスタル」を直列に繋ぎ、
属性を連続で変換させることで、
「風属性を火属性に変換」したんだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_004<tab>Hmmm... Mayhap it is better that we remain positive.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_004<tab>少々大変だったが……
あとは、この船に組みこむだけだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_005<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I want to thank you. For reuniting me with my ship, for trusting in me to develop this plan...for everything. You've helped me to rediscover a part of myself I'd forgotten. I am not the man I once was, and I do not know if I ever shall be...but I <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> know one thing: this feels right.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_005<tab>……やはり、不思議だ。
自分では何も思い出せないのに、手がすべてを覚えている。
そして、作業に没頭していると、何故か心が浮き立つんだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_006<tab>...My apologies for the sudden outpouring of sentiment. I would have waited until after the mission, but...well, you understand.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_006<tab>……さっそく属性変換機構を
エンタープライズに組みこむとしよう。
この船を本当の姿に蘇らせるために……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000010_CID<tab>There...she's ready...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000010_CID<tab>これで直った……はずだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah, she stirs...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000020_ALPHINAUD<tab>これが「エンタープライズ」の本当の姿か！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>To Coerthas! And an audience with the harpy queen Garuda!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000030_ALPHINAUD<tab>目指すは、クルザス北方……。
蛮神「ガルーダ」の祭壇、「ハウリングアイ石塔群」だ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>...engage!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000040_ALPHINAUD<tab>エンタープライズ、発進！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000050_CID<tab>Phew...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000050_CID<tab>……ふぅ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000060_CID<tab>Damn it!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000060_CID<tab>……ッ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000070_CID<tab>I...I once flew in this airship. And I was not alone.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000070_CID<tab>そうだ……俺は、かつてこの船で……。
エンタープライズで……大空を駆けていた。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000080_CID<tab>There were adventurers on board...adventurers like you.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_000080_CID<tab>お前たちのような、勇敢な冒険者を乗せて……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100090_CID<tab>Just how long have I worn these damn goggles?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100090_CID<tab>このイカしたゴーグルは、
いつから着けていたんだっけな。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100100_CID<tab>Ah, yes. I fancied myself a trendsetter in my younger days.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100100_CID<tab>そういえば、ガキの頃は、
もっと「坊ちゃん」みてえな格好してたっけ……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100110_CID<tab>The young prodigy, admired by all...exactly like his father.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100110_CID<tab>みんなに褒められるのが嬉しかったな。
親父に近づけた気がして。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100120_CID<tab>Born and raised in Garlemald...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100120_CID<tab>俺は帝国……「ガレマール帝国」で生まれたんだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100130_CID<tab>It was only natural that the precocious young student should become an engineer. Had his father not done the same?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100130_CID<tab>そして、親父の背中を追うように、
魔導技術を学び、機工師になった。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100140_CID<tab>Father... When did we stop seeing eye to eye?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100140_CID<tab>いつ頃からだったかな、親父と……。
ミド・ナン・ガーロンドと話さなくなったのは。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100150_CID<tab>When did Meteor become your everything, and your loved ones cease to matter?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100150_CID<tab>そうか……。
野郎が「メテオ計劃（けいかく）」に
のめり込みはじめてからだ……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100160_CID<tab>You abandoned us all. But he was there for me, Father─there for me when you were not.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100160_CID<tab>そういや、この頃からか。
アイツが俺の後見人を買ってくれたのは。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100170_CID<tab>Though he proved no better in the end. Gaius was just another man with an all-consuming obsession.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100170_CID<tab>しかし、結局はアイツも……。
ガイウス・ヴァン・バエサルも侵略者に成りはて、
失望した俺は帝国から逃げ出した。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100180_CID<tab>And so I ran─left the Empire behind and came to Eorzea, where I built the Ironworks.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100180_CID<tab>そして、エオルゼアに渡り、
ガーロンド・アイアンワークスを立ち上げた。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100190_CID<tab>Ah, yes! It was then that I first donned these goggles.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100190_CID<tab>そうだったな、この時からだ。
このゴーグルを着けるようになったのは。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100200_CID<tab>Eorzea opened my eyes. It was home to so many manner of people, each with their own hopes and dreams. People worth saving. And so I fought beside them.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100200_CID<tab>俺はエオルゼアで、さまざまな人々、冒険者と出会い、
親父を狂わせた「メテオ計劃」と戦った。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100210_CID<tab>I wanted to prove that my knowledge could serve a nobler purpose.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100210_CID<tab>俺は証明したかった。
技術が、自由のためにあるってことを。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100220_CID<tab>I wanted to prove that there was another way...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100220_CID<tab>そして、それを認めさせたかった……。
救いたかったんだな、俺は、親父を。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100230_CID<tab>And it all began that day, when I found my new home...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_100230_CID<tab>このゴーグルは、その決意の証だったじゃないか。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200240_CID<tab>I had forgotten how wonderful it was. The wind in your hair, the endless sky...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200240_CID<tab>忘れていたぜ。
この風を……この空を……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200250_CID<tab>That light─it was you, wasn't it?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200250_CID<tab>さっき感じた光……。
あれは、お前なんだろ。
ありがとよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200260_CID<tab>It's surprising how few people know this, but <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> pureblood Garleans have a third eye.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200260_CID<tab>生粋の帝国人……ガレアン族はな、
額に「第三の眼」なんてのを持ってんだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200270_CID<tab>Perhaps mine helped me recognize you─or perhaps it was just a lucky guess.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200270_CID<tab>そのためかね。
なんとなくわかるんだよ、感覚的にだけどな。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200280_CID<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> was made for this! To carry Eorzea's protectors into battle!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200280_CID<tab>このエンタープライズは、お前たちのような英雄を、
戦場に送るための船だ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200290_CID<tab>I am proud to be able to call her my own.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200290_CID<tab>俺は、この船の主であることを、
この船で飛べることを誇りに思うぜ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200300_ALPHINAUD<tab>Cid─what exactly do you remember?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200300_ALPHINAUD<tab>シド……？
まさか記憶が！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200310_CID<tab>Alphinaud, my boy─sorry to have been such a burden.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200310_CID<tab>アルフィノ……だったな。
面倒をかけちまった。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200320_CID<tab>I remember everything...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200320_CID<tab>俺の名は、シド！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200330_CID<tab>My name, my people, and my purpose. Everything.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200330_CID<tab>ガーロンド・アイアンワークスの代表、
シド・ガーロンドだ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200340_CID<tab>Come! It would be rude to keep Garuda waiting!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_200340_CID<tab>行くぜ！
蛮神「ガルーダ」をぶっ飛ばしによ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300350_CID<tab>It took a while for the memory to return, but I remember you.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300350_CID<tab>まったく、恥ずかしい話だぜ。
今の今まで、お前に気付かなかったなんて。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300360_CID<tab>The floating isle, van Darnus... We ended it, that day─or so we thought.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300360_CID<tab>俺たちは、5年前の戦いを
ともに駆け抜けた戦友だというのによ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300370_CID<tab>Listen─let's keep this between the two of us, for the time being.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300370_CID<tab>ほかのヤツらには、お前が生きていたことを
しばらく黙ってるつもりだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300380_CID<tab>If word got out that one of the Warriors of Light had returned, the eyes of the world would soon be upon us─our enemies' included. And that's the kind of attention we could well do without.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300380_CID<tab>この状況だ、5年前の英雄が生きていたなんて知れりゃ、
各国は大混乱。
お前も身動きが取れなくなっちまうだろう。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300390_CID<tab>What, isn't it enough that <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> know the truth?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300390_CID<tab>なに、ほかでもない俺が思い出したんだ。
それで十分だろ？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300400_CID<tab>Don't worry. A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of your talents won't go unnoticed for long. Someday, they <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> remember you─and you'll never know another moment's peace!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300400_CID<tab>お前は特別な存在だ。
いつかきっと、みんな思い出すさ。
それまで、俺が付いててやる。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300410_CID<tab>There, up ahead! Ready, old friend?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300410_CID<tab>見えてきやがった！
準備はいいか！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300420_CID<tab>Hah! Some things never change! We're going in!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_300420_CID<tab>ヘッ……相変わらず、いい返事だぜッ！！
ヒャッハー！！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>All our efforts...all our travails...all of it was for this.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>なんとか、風壁は無事に突破できた。
目的の蛮神「ガルーダ」は、恐らくこの門の先……
いよいよ決戦の時がきたようだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Make ready, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, for the end is nigh─be it hers or our own.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>ここまでの長きに渡る道程も、すべてはこの一戦のため。
さあ……蛮神「ガルーダ」を倒すぞ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_100_021<tab>Beyond those gates awaits our foe. Are you prepared to meet with her?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_100_021<tab>蛮神「ガルーダ」は強敵だが、
長い旅の中で、君もまた強くなっているはずだ。
さあ……蛮神「ガルーダ」を倒すぞ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_051<tab>(-???-)Who dares intrude upon my sanctuary!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_051<tab>(-？？？？-)こしゃくなッ……！
わたくしの「ギガメスの大風壁」を突破しおるとはッ……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_052<tab>(-???-)Your insolence shall not go unpunished, landwalkers!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_052<tab>(-？？？？-)愚かなクソ虫めがッ！
クソ虫にはクソ虫のッ、分限があることも忘れたかッ！！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>Twelve preserve...she's...she's <var 1A 02 /var>huge<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_053<tab>あれが、蛮神「ガルーダ」か！？
……なんという威風なんだ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_054<tab>As I live and breathe...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_054<tab>さすがは、最凶の蛮神ってわけか。
酷薄な顔をしてやがる……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_055<tab>Over there─look.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_055<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>。
……いや、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あそこを見てみろ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_056<tab>Amalj'aa and kobold prisoners. But why would the Ixal bring them here...?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_056<tab>ヤツら、ほかの蛮族どもを捕らえてやがる。
……蛮神「ガルーダ」への生贄のつもりか。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_057<tab>Heehee HAHA hahaha HEEHEE haha HEEEEEE!!!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_057<tab>アーッハハハハハハッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_058<tab>Wherefore come you hither, foolish mortals!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_058<tab>地を這う虫ケラどもがッ！
ここが、わたくしの城と知って訪うたかッ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>Garuda! We are come to put an end to your reign of terror!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_059<tab>そうだッ！
私たちは貴様を倒すためにきた！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_060<tab>Hear you this blasphemy, my children? These landwalkers would bring me low!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_060<tab>聞こえたかッ、皆の者ッ！
虫ケラめが、なにやらチィチィ言うておるぞッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_061<tab>You who are bound to crawl upon the earth should revere me─FOR I AM THE WIND!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_061<tab>虫ケラは虫ケラらしくッ！
地に這いつくばり、土でも食んでおれば良いのじゃッ！
この大空で輝く、わたくしを崇めてなッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_062<tab>Did we not take to the skies, and slip your defenses!? We are bound by <var 1A 02 /var>nothing<var 1A 01 /var>, Garuda!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_062<tab>ヘッ、その虫ケラでもなぁ！
こうやって空を飛び、お前の懐に入ることができたんだ！
そして、このままお前を討つことだってできる！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_063<tab>You think your playthings give you strength?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_063<tab>この空は、わたくしのものよッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_064<tab>They will not help you here, landwalker. This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> realm, where none can challenge my supremacy! Struggle though you may─I shall slake the roots with your blood, and festoon the canopy with your ENTRAILS! HAHAHAHAHAAA!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_064<tab>……虫ケラごときが空を舞うなどと
くだらぬ夢を二度とみれぬよう……
その臓腑をむしりッ、血祭りにあげてくれようぞッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_IXALGURU_000_065<tab>Squaaawk! Slay the unfeathered ones, we shall! As an offering to Garuda, they will serve!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_IXALGURU_000_065<tab>我らがッァ、御神「ガルーダ」様にッィ、
仇成す羽根ナシどもめッェ！　討ち取らえよッォ！
聖地よりッィ、生きて返すなッァ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_066<tab>Leave the Ixal to us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We will keep them distracted while you deal with her!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_066<tab>イクサル族どもは、俺たちが圧える！
お前は、蛮神「ガルーダ」を倒せ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>Do not fail, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Remember: you fight for the Scions! For Eorzea!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_067<tab>蛮神との戦いも、これで最後だ！
行け、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>！
「暁」のため……エオルゼアのために！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_068<tab>This worm would die by mine own hand! Come, then...I shall grant you that which you seek!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_068<tab>なれば……虚妄にまみれしそのそっ首ッ！
薄紙のごときその羽もッ！　腕もッ！　足もッ！
すべてッ！　むしり取ってくれようぞッ！！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_080<tab>No... Nooo! NO! NO!!!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_080<tab>オオオッ……オオオオオッ……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_081<tab>What!? How in the hells─!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_081<tab>なにィ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_082<tab>HAHAHAHAHAAA! This...is...MY REALM! You have no hope here! None! NONNNE!!!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_082<tab>アーッハハハハハハッ！
無駄じゃッ、無駄なことじゃッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_083<tab>Did you truly believe you could defy a god, landwalkers!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_083<tab>愚かなクソ虫めがッ！
その程度で、わたくしが寂滅するとでも思うたかッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_084<tab>My power is limitless! My children legion!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_084<tab>ここには、我が下僕らによりて、
無数のクリスタルが集められておるッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_085<tab>And they have rendered unto me a wealth of crystals.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_085<tab>「クリスタルの力」はッ……！
すなわち、わたくしの力ッ……！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_086<tab>Their gifts sustain me, their faith empowers me!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_086<tab>いくら、わたくしを追い詰めたところでッ！
我が下僕らの祈りは増して強まりッ、
その願いによって、わたくしは更なる力を得るッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_087<tab>None save my children will escape the reckoning, mortals! And those who would use <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> crystals to waken the rest shall realize the folly of their faith!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_087<tab>……もはや、この地に醜き神はおらぬッ！
この地のクリスタルは、すべて、わたくしのものよッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_088<tab>Then all shall worship none but me! The one <var 1A 02 /var>true<var 1A 01 /var> god! HEE HEE HEE HEE HEEEEEE!!!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_088<tab>わたくしは最強にして至上の神ッ、嵐神ガルーダじゃッ！
アーッハハハハハハッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_089<tab>...Of course! <var 1A 02 /var>Worship<var 1A 01 /var>! So long as the Ixal keep praying, she will never fall!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_089<tab>……くそッ！
イクサル族どもの祈りを止めさせねば！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_090<tab>Then let's stop them!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_000_090<tab>おう！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>Ugh!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_091<tab>ぐあッ！

source:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_092<tab>HAHA hahaha HEEHEE heehee HAHAHA!!!
No harm will come to you, my children!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_092<tab>アーッハハハハハハッ！
そうはさせぬぞッ、クソ虫めがッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_093<tab>This is only the beginning, landwalkers! All who oppose me shall suffer for their defiance!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_093<tab>クソ虫の分際でッ、無上の存在であるわたくしにッ！
……そして、我が下僕らに牙を向けた報いはッ！
遺漏なく受けねばならぬのじゃッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_094<tab>Soon, the worms of the forest shall receive my judgment! The desert vermin next─their walls of stone will not shield them from the tempest!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_094<tab>まずは、グリダニアのクソ虫どもに野嵐をッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_095<tab>And then will I take vengeance on the sea lice! Their wooden boats cannot outrun the wind!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_095<tab>ウルダハのゲロ虫どもには砂嵐をッ！
そしてッ、リムサ・ロミンサのウジ虫どもには颶嵐をッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_096<tab>Tremble, mortals, for I shall visit you all in time! And all shall be mine! ALL MIIINE!!!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_096<tab>わたくしの嵐で、エオルゼアすべてを包み込みッ、
虫ケラどもを一匹残らず切り裂いてくれようぞッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_097<tab>You, landwalker─you who <var 1A 02 /var>dared<var 1A 01 /var> to raise your hand against me─you shall be the first to pay for your sins! Not with your death─but with your LIFE!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_097<tab>だが、まずは貴様らから……
わたくしに直接刃を向けた貴様らからだッ！
その罪を償うには死すら生ぬるいッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_098<tab>You will serve me, landwalker...to your last breath!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_098<tab>テンパード（信徒）になるが良いッ！
そして、その生命尽きるまで地を這い続けッ……。
わたくしを一向に崇め続けるが良いわッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_099<tab>No, NO!!! I claimed you! You should be MINE!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_099<tab>なんじゃとッ！？
何故じゃッ……何故に貴様はテンパードにならぬッ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_100<tab>What...what <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you? What have you done to me!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_100<tab>か、体からッ……力が抜けるッ……！？
「クリスタルの力」がッ……抜けていくじゃとッ……！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_101<tab>No mortal should possess such power! This...this is impossible!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_GARUDA_000_101<tab>なんなのじゃッ……その力はッ……？
何故、クソ虫ごときの前にッ……。
わたくしは正しく力を発揮できぬのじゃッ……！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600430_GARUDA<tab>Why do you not tremble at my might? Why do you not beg for mercy!? Why do you not DIE!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600430_GARUDA<tab>何故じゃッ……何故に揺るがぬッ……。
何故にひれ伏さぬのじゃッ……！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600440_ALPHINAUD<tab>We've done it!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600440_ALPHINAUD<tab>やったか！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600450_IXAL<tab>Squaaak! Impossible, it is!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600450_IXAL<tab>ナッニィィィィ！！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600460_IXAL<tab>Garuda, kill you all!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600460_IXAL<tab>ガルーダ様ッァ！！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600470_GAIUS<tab>Is that all!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600470_GAIUS<tab>その程度のものか！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600480_GAIUS<tab>O Lady of the Vortex! O mighty Garuda!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600480_GAIUS<tab>その程度のものか！
蛮神「ガルーダ」よ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600490_GAIUS<tab>Of all primals, the most terrible. I say again...IS─THAT─ALL!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600490_GAIUS<tab>現存する蛮神の中で、最も邪悪で、
凶暴と言われるお前の力は、その程度のものなのか！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600500_CID<tab>Gaius!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600500_CID<tab>ガイウス！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600510_GAIUS<tab>Ah, Cid, my boy. You look well─for one who has forsaken <var 1A 02 /var>kin<var 1A 01 /var> and country. I wonder, what else you will forsake before the day is done.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600510_GAIUS<tab>久しいな、シド。
父親から逃げ、国から逃げ、わしからも逃げ……。
次は何から逃げる気だ？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600520_CID<tab>What!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600520_CID<tab>なんだと！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600530_GAIUS<tab>What exactly did you hope to accomplish here this day?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600530_GAIUS<tab>うぬは、なぜここに居る？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600540_CID<tab>I...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600540_CID<tab>なッ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600550_GAIUS<tab>Well, I shall accomplish far more!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600550_GAIUS<tab>我は大義のためにここに居る！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600560_GARUDA<tab>...Is that all? IS THAT ALL!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600560_GARUDA<tab>……その程度……じゃとッ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600570_GARUDA<tab>Insolent mortal! I shall make you suffer!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600570_GARUDA<tab>わたくしは、至高の神じゃぞッ！
おのれッ……たかが人風情がつけあがりおってッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600580_GARUDA<tab>That foul stench... I see now... <var 1A 02 /var>She<var 1A 01 /var> has touched you!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600580_GARUDA<tab>……そうか……理解できたぞッ……。
その穢らわしい力ッ……星の加護じゃなッ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600590_GARUDA<tab>Very well...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600590_GARUDA<tab>なれば……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600600_CID<tab>Seven hells, does she still mean to fight!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600600_CID<tab>何をする気だ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600610_ALPHINAUD<tab>What is she─ Twelve preserve, she cannot mean to─
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600610_ALPHINAUD<tab>あれは、アマルジャ族とコボルド族か！？
……まさか！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600620_AMALJAA<tab>(-Amalj'aa-)O Lord of the Inferno! Almighty Ifrit! Grant us succor in our hour of need!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600620_AMALJAA<tab>ガァァァァッ！
死中求活ッ……降りたまえよ……。
焔神イフリートォォッ！！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600630_KOBOLD<tab>(-Kobolds-)Save us, Titan, Lord of Crags! Ah, it hurts us so, the pain, the pain...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600630_KOBOLD<tab>いたーい　やめーて……。
タイタンさーま　たすーけて……。
たすーけ……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600640_ALPHINAUD<tab>No... No, this is all wrong...
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600640_ALPHINAUD<tab>そんな、こんなことが……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600650_CID<tab>Stop gawping, boy! We must <var 1A 02 /var>run<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600650_CID<tab>何をしている！
引くぞッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600660_GARUDA<tab>Surrender yourselves unto me... I would feast upon your aether. NONE SHALL STAND AGAINST THE WIND!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_600660_GARUDA<tab>弱き神ども……汝らを喰ろうて、
わたくしは、何者にも負けぬ高みへと至るのじゃッ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700670_GAIUS<tab>BEAR WITNESS TO THE GLORY OF THE EMPIRE!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700670_GAIUS<tab>「プロト・アルテマ」よ。
見せてやれ、お前の力を！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700680_GAIUS<tab>It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who will suffer, Garuda!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700680_GAIUS<tab>恐れるか、蛮神「ガルーダ」よ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700690_GAIUS<tab>Ancient Allag had ways of dealing with your kind. Now, look on their ultimate weapon, eikon, and despair!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700690_GAIUS<tab>これこそ、古代アラグ帝国において
究極幻想とまで謳われた対蛮神兵器、
「アルテマウェポン」なり。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700700_GARUDA<tab>No... Nooo! NOOO!
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700700_GARUDA<tab>究極……幻想……じゃとッ！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700710_GAIUS<tab>Magnificent! It exceeds all expectation!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700710_GAIUS<tab>すばらしい力だ！
蛮神、恐るるに足らず！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700720_LAHABREAEORZEA<tab>With each primal it consumes, it grows more powerful. A marvel, is it not?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700720_LAHABREAEORZEA<tab>蛮神を吸収したことで、
アルテマウェポンは最終進化を迎える！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700730_GAIUS<tab>Such is the fate of those who oppose the Empire!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700730_GAIUS<tab>持たざる者は、塵芥（ちりあくた）の如く
消え逝くのみよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700740_GAIUS<tab>There will be no Warriors of Light to save you this time.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700740_GAIUS<tab>「カルテノー」でお前たちを救った、
英雄「光の戦士たち」はもう居ない。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700750_GAIUS<tab>If your leaders are as wise as they are reported, they will surrender.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700750_GAIUS<tab>この力を前に、どう動く。
エオルゼアを統べる弱き為政者たちよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700760_GAIUS<tab>Your skills are impressive, but they will not be enough.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700760_GAIUS<tab>興趣が尽きぬな。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700770_ALPHINAUD<tab>Twelve have mercy! What chance have we against such an ungodly creation!?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700770_ALPHINAUD<tab>な……なんだったのだ、今のは！
何がどうなっている！？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700780_ALPHINAUD<tab>And who was that armored devil!?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700780_ALPHINAUD<tab>あの黒鎧は何者だ？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700790_CID<tab>That was Gaius van Baelsar, legatus of the XIVth Imperial Legion, and supreme commander of the Garlean invasion force in Eorzea.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700790_CID<tab>ヤツの名は、ガイウス・ヴァン・バエサル。
帝国軍第XIV軍団を率いる軍団長……。
つまり、エオルゼア侵攻軍の長だ！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700800_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course, the Black Wolf─how could I not realize? Grandfather mentions him in his journal!
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700800_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうか、奴が猛将「漆黒の王狼」か……。
お祖父様の手記にも、その名があった。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700810_CID<tab>I was never so naive as to think the man would abandon his ambitions, but these developments are beyond my worst expectations...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700810_CID<tab>エオルゼアの支配を諦めたとは思っちゃいなかったが、
まさかこんな切り札を……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700820_CID<tab>What have you been doing these past five years? How could something of this magnitude have escaped the Alliance's attention?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700820_CID<tab>俺が記憶を失っている間、
帝国軍とは膠着状態だったんじゃなかったのか？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700830_ALPHINAUD<tab>We heard no whispers, saw no signs. In the wake of the Calamity, the Empire seized land and built outposts, but that was the extent of their aggression.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700830_ALPHINAUD<tab>そうだ。
各地に拠点を築いてからは、
目立った動きは把握していない。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700840_CID<tab>Damn it, Gaius, where in the seven hells did you find that thing?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700840_CID<tab>クソッ……。
ガイウスめ、何を企んでいる。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700850_ALPHINAUD<tab>It has been a day of unexpected developments, but the fact remains: Garuda is no longer a threat.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700850_ALPHINAUD<tab>ともあれ、蛮神「ガルーダ」の脅威は去った。
釈然としない幕切れではあったがな……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700860_ALPHINAUD<tab>While I take no comfort in the manner of her downfall, it <var 1A 02 /var>does<var 1A 01 /var> mean that we may safely put the matter of the primals to one side─for the time being, at least.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700860_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああなっては、なおのこと、
蛮神たちは、しばらく鳴りを潜めるだろう。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700870_CID<tab>Which just leaves the matter of Gaius's new toy.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700870_CID<tab>蛮神の次は、やはり帝国ってわけか。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Indeed. That weapon poses the greatest threat to Eorzea. It must be destroyed.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700880_ALPHINAUD<tab>ああ……。
あの兵器は、エオルゼアの新たな脅威となろう。
叩かねばならん。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700890_ALPHINAUD<tab>But first, we must needs find out all we can.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700890_ALPHINAUD<tab>とはいえ、情報を集めんことには動きようがない。
我々にも休息が必要だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700900_ALPHINAUD<tab>Let us make for Vesper Bay. We shall rebuild the Scions.
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700900_ALPHINAUD<tab>「暁の血盟」本部へ向かおう。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700910_ALPHINAUD<tab>All is not yet lost, my friend─for we bear the light, and shall surely lead our people from the darkness.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_700910_ALPHINAUD<tab>希望の灯火は消えてはいない。
あそこから、もう一度「暁」に明かりを灯そうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_900<tab>Well, that was an experience I would rather not have again.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_900<tab>……ふぅ、ようやく着いたか。
いろいろなことが一度に起こって、
さすがの私も混乱気味だよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_901<tab>Something has been troubling me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Shortly before the Black Wolf took center stage, when Garuda attempted to claim you as her own, I could have sworn I saw...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_901<tab>しかし、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>……。
蛮神「ガルーダ」を制した君の力はいったい……。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_902<tab>Ah, but I'm sure I was mistaken. In times of great stress, the evidence of the eye is apt to be misread by even the most inquiring mind. Forget I mentioned it.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_902<tab>……いや、すまない。
今は難しいことを考えるのはよそう。
とにかく、蛮神「ガルーダ」は倒したのだ。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_903<tab>Returning to the subject of our earlier discussion, we may consider the matter of the primals closed until further notice. No beast tribe will <var 1A 02 /var>dare<var 1A 01 /var> summon their god so long as that weapon exists.
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_903<tab>蛮神「ガルーダ」が倒されたとなれば、
どの蛮族も神降ろし……召喚を控えるだろう。
蛮神が絶対的存在ではないことが証明されたのだからな。

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_904<tab>Truly, a more effective deterrent I could not imagine. It almost seems a shame to plot its destruction...
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ALPHINAUD_000_904<tab>エオルゼアを騒がせていた「蛮神問題」は、
一時的にではあるが解決した。
本当に、よくやってくれた！

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_050_031<tab>You know, it's not easy guiding the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> through a ceaselessly swirling wall of wind. I would rather not risk our lives again until you're sure─meaning absolutely <var 1A 02 /var>certain<var 1A 01 /var>─that you're ready. Are you?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_CID_050_031<tab>蛮神「ガルーダ」は、嵐に守られた祭壇にいる。
……さっそく「ハウリングアイ石塔群」へ向かうか？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q2_000_031<tab>Travel to the Howling Eye?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q2_000_031<tab>ハウリングアイ石塔群へ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_LIONNELLAIS_050_032<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Do you wish to proceed to your vessel?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_LIONNELLAIS_050_032<tab>グリダニア・ランディングのロビーへ
お入りになりますか？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q3_000_032<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q3_000_032<tab>ロビーへ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ELYENORA_050_033<tab>Greetings, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. Do you wish to proceed to your vessel?
target:
TEXT_MANFST404_00519_ELYENORA_050_033<tab>ウルダハ・ランディングのロビーへ
お入りになりますか？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q4_000_033<tab>Proceed to the landing area?
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_Q4_000_033<tab>ロビーへ移動しますか？

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_035<tab>Yes
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_035<tab>はい

source: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_036<tab>No
target: TEXT_MANFST404_00519_A1_000_036<tab>いいえ
